sentences.sContent: Thus, his preaching was directed at not only the laity, but the clergy as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus, his preaching was directed at not only the laity, but the clergy as well.
sentences.sCn: 因此，他的讲道面向的不只是世俗之人，也面向神职人员。

words.tran: 书记的；牧师的；办事员的

trans.tranOther: the official leaders of religious activities in organized religions, such as priests,  rabbi s  , and  mullah s
